business.headline: US stock market: Wall Street indices remain under pressure amid slowdown fearsAt the opening bell, the Dow Jones Industrial Average dropped 73.8 points, or 0.18%, to 41,837.95. The S&P 500 lost 10.9 points, or 0.19%, to 5,603.65, while the Nasdaq Composite was the only major index that recovered slightly in early trade.

Donald Trump to meet CEOs of America's biggest firms after Wall Street crashPresident Donald Trump is expected to speak with around 100 CEOs at a regular meeting of the Business Roundtable in Washington, an influential group of CEOs leading major US companies from Apple to JPMorgan Chase and Walmart.

Looking for fixed deposit with up to 9% interest? Check these small finance banksUnity Small Finance Bank offers 9% per annum for a 1001-day fixed deposit and 7.85% per annum for a one-year fixed deposit.

Why did Elon Musk's wealth shrink by $29 billion in a single day? Tesla's struggles have had a major impact on Musk's financial losses. In the past two months, Tesla's stock has fallen by 35%,wiping out $400 billion in market value.
Airtel signs deal with Elon Musk's SpaceX to bring Starlink internet to IndiaThe deal depends on SpaceX getting approval from authorities to sell Starlink services in India.
Sensex ends marginally lower, Nifty in green; IndusInd Bank crashes 27%The S&P BSE Sensex lost 12.85 points to end at 74,102.32, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 37.60 points to close at 22,497.90.

UPI and RuPay merchant charges may return: What it means for youThe government is planning to introduce a tiered pricing system, where bigger businesses pay higher charges while small businesses pay reduced charges.

Elon Musk says balancing DOGE and CEO roles is tough as Tesla shares slideElon Musk has been actively involved in Tesla, SpaceX, X (formerly Twitter), and xAI, along with his inclination to working with the Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE).

IndusInd Bank share price crashes 27%: Buy, hold or sell?IndusInd Bank stock price: At the closing bell, IndusInd Bank shares were down 27.17% to Rs 655.95 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE), marking their worst trading session ever.
DA hike: How much can central government employees expect?The expected hike is likely to benefit around 12 million central government employees and pensioners under the 7th Pay Commission.

US stock market crash: Why Sensex, Nifty aren't feeling the heatThe S&P BSE Sensex was down less than 170 points at around 11:35 am, while the NSE Nifty50 fluctuated between gains and losses. The 50-share index was down barely 20 points but showed no signs of panic. Broader market indices also stayed flat as volatility spiked.

Skipped filing ITR? You may get a tax notice very soonThe tax authorities use a risk management strategy (RMS) to flag high-risk non-filers, said the department.  This system looks at high-value transactions (property purchases, large bank deposits, etc.), income from salary, rent, mutual funds, and shares, etc.

entertainment.headline: SRK, Aishwarya Rai top contenders to replace Amitabh Bachchan on KBC: StudyAccording to a recent study conducted among fans, actors Shah Rukh Khan and Aishwarya Rai are the top picks to replace megastar Amitabh Bachchan on his game show Kaun Banega Crorepati.

TV star Disha Vakani was told not to scream during labour: Gayatri Mantra helpedDisha Vakani, famed for her role as Dayaben in TMKOC, opened up about her use of the Gayatri Mantra during the birth of her daughter, Stuti.

Louis Tomlinson on first India visit, solo career, Lollapalooza, love for Indian food | Exclusive Former One Direction member Louis Tomlinson finally arrives in India! In this exclusive chat with India Today's Bhavna Agarwal, he talks about his long-awaited visit, his excitement for Lollapalooza, and his deep love for Indian food (yes, he tried butter chicken!).

Daredevil Born Again breaks streaming records with 7.5 million views Latest Marvel series, Daredevil Born Again, has set a new streaming record with 7.5 million views in just five days. The series marks the return of Charlie Cox as Daredevil, alongside a mix of returning and new cast members.
American rock band Guns N' Roses to return to India after 12 years American rock band Guns N' Roses will return to India after 12 years. They will perform in Mumbai on May 17.

Kim Soo-hyun denies 'baseless' relationship claims with late actor Kim Sae-ronActor Kim Soo-hyun and his agency Gold Medalist have rejected allegations made by the YouTube channel Garosero Research Institute. The accusations suggest a past relationship with the late Kim Sae-ron and blame the agency for her financial woes.

KKK 14's Aditi Sharma heads for divorce, husband alleges infidelity in 4 monthsTV actor Aditi Sharma's marital bliss was short-lived as her husband Abhineet Kaushik accused her of cheating. This comes just four months after their secret wedding on November 12, 2024.

Mallika Sherawat in talks for Khatron Ke Khiladi 15: ReportMallika Sherawat is reportedly in talks for Khatron Ke Khiladi 15. While her participation isn't confirmed, she recently returned to Bollywood and is now looking for her next big project.

Singer Isabel LaRosa on performing at Lolla India: The experience was surrealIsabel LaRosa, known for hits like Favourite and I'm Yours, recently performed at Lollapalooza India. She discussed her music-making process and experience with India Today Digital.

Dhanashree Verma restores photos with Yuzvendra Chahal amid rumours of divorceDhanashree Verma restored Instagram photos with Yuzvendra Chahal amid divorce rumours. While her lawyer confirmed court proceedings, her family denied claims of a Rs 60 crore alimony demand.

Udit Narayan mocks the kiss row at 'Pintu Ki Pappi' eventVeteran playback singer Udit Narayan opened up about the viral kiss incident a month after backlash. He discussed the timeline of the video where he is seen kissing his female fans.

Ashish Chanchlani makes public appearance after India's Got Latent row. WatchContent creator Ashish Chanchlani made a rare public appearance in Mumbai amid controversy surrounding Ranveer Allahbadia's comment on India's Got Latent.

general news.headline: Baloch separatists hijack Pak train, claim 20 security forces killed, 182 hostage Live UpdatesSeparatist militants from the Baloch Liberation Army (BLA) targetted a train in Pakistan's Balochistan province carrying around 500 passengers, claiming to have taken over 180 hostages and killed at least 20 security personnel.

Baloch militants blew up track in tunnel, opened fire on Pak train: What we knowPakistan Train Hijack News: The Baloch Liberation Army (BLA) claimed to have taken over 180 passengers, including security forces, hostage aboard the Jaffar Express.
Airtel signs deal with Elon Musk's SpaceX to bring Starlink internet to IndiaThe deal depends on SpaceX getting approval from authorities to sell Starlink services in India.

CBI probes Ranya Rao's wedding footage, guest list, gifts for smuggling linksCBI officials conducted searches at Kannada actor Ranya Rao's residence, KIADB office, and wedding venue as they probed for links to gold smuggling. The officials were scrutinising expensive gifts and high-profile connections.
India has democracy, not democratic valuesMost parties in India are family-run circuses and the one that isn't has different family values, not strictly democratic values, to guide it.
IndusInd Bank shares crash 27% to record worst trading day ever. Here's whyIndusInd Bank's share price plunged 27.17% to Rs 655.95 at the closing bell, marking its worst trading session ever.

With Bhojpuri beats and Bharat bond, why tiny Mauritius matters to IndiaPrime Minister Narendra Modi was welcomed to Mauritius with Bihari Geet Gawai by the Indian diaspora. Modi is in Mauritius on a two-day visit to celebrate Mauritius' National Day on March 12. This is why the tiny island nation, which has historical links with India, holds strategic importance for New Delhi.

All about BLA's Majeed Brigade, Fateh Squad, STOS that led Pak train hijackingThe Balochistan Liberation Army (BLA) has claimed responsibility for hijacking a train in Pakistan's Bolan district, holding hundreds of passengers hostage. The BLA, which has a history dating back to post-independence, has fought several battles against the state of Pakistan. It operates through several specialised units, including Zirab, which is reportedly behind the hijacking.
UP man hangs from moving train, slips while recording Instagram reel. Watch videoIn the viral video, the man is seen clinging to a train window while dangerously hanging outside.

Stalin's anti-Hindi stand gets troll treatment with 'Yappa Yappa Stalin Appa'Tamil Nadu Chief Minister MK Stalin is facing an unusual wave of trolling over his stand against the "Hindi imposition". The BJP seized the moment to highlight what they call DMK's hypocrisy on the three-language policy.
Holi long weekend: Where is India headed?As Holi falls on a Friday, Indian travel enthusiasts are keen on utilising this extended weekend for mini vacations.
Mauritius honours PM Modi with Grand Commander of the Order of the Star and Key of the Indian OceanMauritius honours PM Modi with Grand Commander of the Order of the Star and Key of the Indian Ocean

Makhana, holy Sangam water, Ganesha idol: PM's gifts to Mauritius PresidentPrime Minister Narendra Modi, who arrived in Mauritius on a two-day state visit today, gifted Mauritius President Dharambeer Gokhool and First Lady Vrinda Gokhool superfood makhana, holy water from the Triveni Sangam in Prayagraj and a Lord Ganesha idol.

Mallikarjun Kharge's 'derogatory' remark stirs row in Rajya Sabha, he clarifiesThe Rajya Sabha again witnessed heated scenes over the three-language formula that has sparked a row between Tamil Nadu and the Centre.

Why did Elon Musk's wealth shrink by $29 billion in a single day? Tesla's struggles have had a major impact on Musk's financial losses. In the past two months, Tesla's stock has fallen by 35%,wiping out $400 billion in market value.

3 killed, 17 injured in Ukraine's biggest-ever drone attack on MoscowMoscow Mayor Sergei Sobyanin said Tuesday's was the biggest Ukrainian drone attack on the city, which along with the surrounding region has a population of at least 21 million and is one of the biggest metropolitan areas in Europe.

Social media claims Rohit Sharma forgot the trophy. Here's why we think he didn'tChampions Trophy 2025: A video of Rohit Sharma leaving the post-final press conference without taking the Champions Trophy has gone viral. Fans on social media claimed it was one of those moments when Rohit's infamous memory lapses were at play. However, here's what a closer look at the full video tells us.

Delhi court allows FIR against Arvind Kejriwal over alleged funds misuseThe case pertains to a complaint filed back in 2019, claiming that Arvind Kejriwal, along with former AAP MLA Gulab Singh and Dwarka Councillor Nitika Sharma, misused public funds by installing large hoardings across the area.

Pakistan appalled by trophy ceremony snub, seeks formal clarification from ICCThe Pakistan Cricket Board has sought formal clarification about the absence of PCB officials during the trophy presentation ceremony after the final. However, the PCB is unlikely to get any formal explanation from the global cricket body.

Kush Maini becomes 1st Indian in F1 since 2012, joins Alpine as reserve driverKush Maini became the third Indian driver to be a part of F1 as he joined the Alpine team as a reserve driver. Maini will continue to act as a test driver for the team as well, with a view to making it to the main grid in 2026.

Romance to rage: Actor Nani's boldest career shift takes offNani, the 'Natural Star' of Telugu cinema, is undergoing a remarkable transformation from his boy-next-door image to a rugged, intense action hero. With films like HIT 3 and The Paradise, he is stepping into darker, more complex roles, reflecting the evolving tastes of his audience.

Bangladesh moves against top army general close to Pak over coup plot: SourcesThe move comes after the Bangladesh Army chief was flagged about meetings being called by Lt Gen Faizur Rahman, a known Jamaat sympathiser, without his knowledge.

Live: Baloch militants hijack Pak train, claim they took 182 hostage, killed 20 troopsJaffar Express train hijacked live updates: A passenger train in Pakistan carrying around 500 people was hijacked by Baloch separatists in the country's restive Balochistan province on Tuesday. The Balochistan Liberation Army (BLA) militants stopped the Jaffar Express in a tunnel after blowing up a track and claimed that they had taken 182 hostages, and killed 20 Pakistani military personnel. The BLA, a militant separatist group seeking autonomy for the region, has also threatened to execute all hostages if security forces didn't retreat. The train, which was coming from Quetta and going towards Peshawar, was attacked and efforts were being made to establish contact with the people on board, government officials said. Follow indiatoday.in for live updates.

No commitments made: India on Donald Trump's tariff cut claimIndia has made no trade tariff commitments to the US, Commerce Secretary Sunil Barthwal told a Parliamentary panel, rejecting President Trump's claim that New Delhi agreed to significantly slash import duties on American products.

Nani's Tamil-Telugu project with Don director Cibi Chakravarthi shelved: ReportActor Nani's much-anticipated collaboration with Don director Cibi Chakravarthi has reportedly been called off due to financial complications linked to Cibi's previous commitments with Tamil producers.

Lauren Graham accidentally reveals father of Mae Whitman's babyLauren Graham accidentally revealed Carlos Valdes as Mae Whitman's baby's father on a podcast. Whitman and Valdes kept their relationship private, but Valdes recently discussed fatherhood, balancing Broadway and parenting.

The Gentlemen to Mobland: What makes Guy Ritchie a master of British gangster filmsGuy Ritchie has redefined British gangster films with his unique style and storytelling. From his breakout hit Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels to his latest project Mobland, Ritchie's work remains influential in the genre.

Raghav Chadha meets rapper 50 Cent in the US: Was looking for a dollar but...Bollywood actor Parineeti Chopra's husband, politician Raghav Chadha, recently met American rapper 50 Cent during his visit to the US.

sports.headline: Pakistan appalled by trophy ceremony snub, seeks formal clarification from ICCThe Pakistan Cricket Board has sought formal clarification about the absence of PCB officials during the trophy presentation ceremony after the final. However, the PCB is unlikely to get any formal explanation from the global cricket body.

MS Dhoni joins Rishabh Pant in sister's gala wedding at MussoorieTwo generations of Indian wicketkeepers Rishabh Pant and MS Dhoni are currently in Mussoorie for the former's sister's wedding. Rishabh Pant's sister Sakshi is getting married to Ankit Chaudhary.

El Clasico: Carles Puyol, Luis Figo to play Legends match in IndiaLegendary FC Barcelona captain Carles Puyol and former Real Madrid striker Luis Figo are amongst two of the big names to play the El Clasico Legends in India. The match is set to be played at the DY Patil Stadium in Navi Mumbai.

Gujarat Titans IPL 2025 Complete Schedule: Full GT Fixtures, Venues, Match DatesGujarat Titans IPL 2025 Full Schedule: After a fantastic auction, Gujarat Titans will be aiming to head back to the promise land of playoffs in IPL 2025.

WFI suspension revoked: Why the government decided to take drastic callSports minister Mansukh Mandaviya told India Today the reason why the decision was made to revoke the suspension put on the Wrestling Federation of India. The WFI's suspension was lifted on March 11.

Manchester United announce plan to build new 100,000-seater stadiumManchester United have announced plans to build a new 100,000-seater stadium next to the existing Old Trafford on Tuesday, March 11. The new stadium will be the centrepiece of the Old Trafford regeneration project by United.

No one can tell Rohit, Virat to retire, they should play till 2027: Yograj SinghFormer India cricketer Yograj Singh believes that Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli should play till the 2027 World Cup. Yograj was glad that Rohit did not announce his retirement after the Champions Trophy.

Kolkata Knight Riders Complete Schedule: Full KKR Fixtures, Venues, Match DatesKolkata Knight Riders IPL 2025 Full Schedule, KKR Squad: Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) won the title last year under Shreyas Iyer, and will begin their campaign against Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) in the tournament opener on March 22.

Very few messaged me: Shreyas Iyer recalls tough phase before Champions TrophyChampions Trophy hero Shreyas Iyer recalled the highs and lows of the last 18 months of his cricket career. After losing the central contract with the BCCI, Shreyas led KKR to IPL success in 2024 and played a key role in India's Champions Trophy success.

Above my pay grade: Hardik Pandya when asked why India didn't play in PakistanHardik Pandya gave a witty response to a journalist who asked why India didn't travel to Pakistan during the Champions Trophy 2025. India played all their matches in Dubai during the tournament.

Bengaluru's Chinnaswamy stadium to use treated wastewater for IPL 2025As Bengaluru faces another water crisis as summer approaches, the authorities will continue supplying treated wastewater to Chinnaswamy Stadium for IPL 2025.

Hardik Pandya joins Mumbai Indians after Champions Trophy winIPL 2025: After guiding India to glory in the Champions Trophy in Dubai, Hardik Pandya has joined the Mumbai Indians (MI) and will be looking to put in some strong performances for the five-time champions.

On This Day: RCB sign Virat Kohli in IPL U-19 draft after Delhi blunderOn this day in 2008, Royal Challengers Bengaluru snapped up Virat Kohli during the IPL U-19 draft after Delhi opted not to sign their local man. Kohli has remained with RCB since the first IPL season.

RCB can play party-spoilers for Mumbai Indians. Here's howWPL 2025: The match between Mumbai Indians (MI) and Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) on Tuesday at the Brabourne Stadium would decide the finalist for the ongoing edition.

Why Indian team won't have felicitation ceremony after Champions Trophy winThe Indian team won't have a felicitation ceremony after their Champions Trophy win on Sunday, March 9 against New Zealand. The players are slowly returning home after their title win with IPL 2025 season set to start.

All England Open Badminton Championships: When and where to watch Double Olympic medallist PV Sindhu, Lakshya Sen are amongst the Indian stars to take part in the All England Open Badminton Championships 2025 to be staged from March 11 to 16 in Birmingham.

No Shakib, Mahmudullah opts out as BCB reveal 2025 central contract listShakib Al Hasan was overlooked as Mahmudullah decided to opt out of the Bangladesh Cricket Board's central contract list for 2025. Taskin Ahmed was the only player to be given the Grade A+ contract.

Some Manchester United players not 'good enough', some 'overpaid': Jim RatcliffeManchester United co-owner Jim Ratcliffe has delivered a damning verdict on the current squad, saying some of the players are not 'good enough'. Ratcliffe also gave his backing to current manager Ruben Amorim.

Watch: After Champions Trophy win, Ravindra Jadeja joins CSK in 'Pushpa' styleAfter helping India win the Champions Trophy, Ravindra Jadeja arrived at the Chennai Super Kings team base with some 'Pushpa' swag on Monday, March 10. Jadeja will be a key player for Chennai this season.

Sports Ministry revokes suspension of Wrestling Federation of India The Sports Ministry has revoked the suspension of the Wrestling Federation of India (WFI). Back in December 2023, the Ministry had suspended the WFI over taking hasty decision and showing disregard for the existing rules and regulations.

Rohit, Kohli show there is more than one way to answer retirement callsVirat Kohli and Rohit Sharma answered their critics in fine fashion and guided India to their third Champions Trophy title on Sunday, March 9. With no retirement on the horizon for both men, is the famous Ro-Ko aiming for a World Cup 2027 bow?

Haris Rauf blessed with baby boy before New Zealand T20IsPakistan speedster Haris Rauf became a father with wife Muzna Masood Malik. Rauf's teammates Shadab Khan and Shaheen Shah Afridi took to social media to congratulate the pacer.

Another injury blow to Mayank Yadav, pacer to miss 1st half of IPL: Report IPL 2025: LSG fast bowler Mayank Yadav is racing against time to recover from the back injury he sustained last year. The speedster could only play four games last year due to a side strain.

Transitioning New Zealand deserve to be put on a high pedestal   Champions Trophy 2025: Despite not having Matt Henry, their premier fast bowler and the leading wicket-taker of the tournament, New Zealand, with their limited resources, made India work hard in the final on Sunday.

Bracewell to lead New Zealand in T20I series against Pakistan NZ vs PAK: All-rounder Michael Bracewell has been named captain in Mitchell Santner's absence for New Zealand's upcoming five-match T20I series against Pakistan.

WPL: Mumbai Indians closing in on top spot with 9-run win over Gujarat GiantsMumbai Indians beat Gujarat Giants by nine runs in Match 19 of the Women's Premier League 2025 at Brabourne Stadium, Mumbai. Following their win, MI have a great chance of finishing at the top on points table and directly qualify for the final.

Watch: Rohit Sharma poses with his two ICC trophies in front of Burj KhalifaIndia captain Rohit Sharma posed with his two ICC trophies in front of Burj Khalifa following India's triumph in the ICC Champions Trophy 2025. India beat New Zealand by four wickets in the final.

Former Steelers Player and Broadcaster Craig Wolfley Dies at 66Craig Wolfley, a former American footballer and broadcaster, died at 66, confirmed Pittsburgh WDVE-FM radio station on Monday, where he served as a colour commentator.

Watch: After Champions Trophy win, Rohit Sharma back to daddy duties in MumbaiIndia captain Rohit Sharma returned back to daddy duties on his trip back home. Rohit was seen holding a sleepy Samaira (his daughter) as he arrived at the Mumbai airport on Monday, March 10.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
